author: Travis Caldwell, CNN
title: What you need to know about Sunday's Daytona 500 - CNN
description: You don't have to wait long in the grandstands at a NASCAR race before someone references the 1990 fan-favorite film "Days of Thunder," or its most famous quote, "Rubbin', son, is racing."
content:
